title: Business Name on Store Sign in Alameda, California
author: andreas ouroboros

comments.content:
There was a font called **[Harrington](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125425/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Font-Bureau%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Harrington%20Bold%20-%20Bold&fid=c1e0c0b95d144c5570946b7af1223fa9&fsize=60&text=TO%20HERB%20WITH%20LOVE&wrap=2)** by Font Bureau [1992] which is very close to your sample (and it also sounds close to Harrison) but I can't find a legitimate source of it anymore.

Close similar: **[Rossetti](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125425/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Scriptorium-Fonts%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Rossetti%20-%20Regular&fid=6686f8850a1efa84fb582af418750a04&fsize=60&text=TO%20HERB%20WITH%20LOVE&wrap=2)** by David F. Nalle [1992, Scriptorium Fonts]

\*EDIT\*: There is also a **[Harrington](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125425/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=DanXSolo%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Harrington%20-%20Normal&fid=89dbafb96829f45b9cd171e5408f5130&fsize=60&text=TO%20HERB%20WITH%20LOVE&wrap=2)** digitized by Dan X. Solo but I'm afraid is available only in the Dover Publication CD accompanying the associated book.

Seems to match the Harrington provided with at least some versions of Windows and/or Microsoft products.  
Don

And here’s a list of such products: [http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/font.aspx?FMID=985](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125425/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/font.aspx?FMID=985 "http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/font.aspx?FMID=985")

It’s available at fonts.com ($40 US, Open Type Format:  
 [http://www.fonts.com/font/font-bureau/harrington/regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125425/http:/www.fonts.com/font/font-bureau/harrington/regular "http://www.fonts.com/font/font-bureau/harrington/regular")
